description:
As Umibozu faces Utsuro, he recalls the strongest enemy he has ever faced: someone you can find in every corner of the universe.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de la bataille finale de Rakuyô 8 - Le maître de Kôan
Battle on Rakuyo Arc: Part 8 - Master of Kouan
Rakuyou Kessen Hen Hachi: Kouan no Nushi
洛陽決戦篇八 徨安のヌシ
